bibl.title: The Indian Ocean in Antiquity: Whither Maritime History?
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de : K.S. BEHERA (Ed.), Maritime Heritage of India (Delhi, 1999) (non vidimus). - [Introduction.] - Maritime trade. - Shipping. - Documentation of boat types. - Fishing and sailing communities. - Conclusion. - References.
bibl.seg: RAY Himanshu Prahba, The Indian Ocean in Antiquity: Whither Maritime History?
